testsuite.name: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Formula syntax

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Formula syntax

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Formula syntax

testcase.name: And I choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Formula syntax

testcase.name: And Question Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Formula syntax

testcase.name: And I click inside the question text editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Formula syntax

testcase.name: And I click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Formula syntax

testcase.name: When I choose "Maple-graded" link from the dialog and complete the correct answer
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Formula syntax

testcase.name: And I set question fields: '{"responseType":"formula"}'
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Formula syntax

testcase.name: And I click OK
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Formula syntax

testcase.name: Then I see the "Maple" Question Widget in the question text section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Formula syntax

testcase.name: When I click the Preview button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Formula syntax

testcase.name: Then I assert that the Maple Formula question is rendered properly on the Question Preview page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Formula syntax

testcase.name: When I change the Maple Formula entry mode to math editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Formula syntax

testcase.name: Then I see the math editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Formula syntax

testcase.name: When I enter "sinh" in the math editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Formula syntax

testcase.name: Then I see the expression "sinh" highlighted in the math editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Formula syntax

testcase.name: When I remove all text in the math editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Formula syntax

testcase.name: And I enter "asin" in the math editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Formula syntax

testcase.name: Then I see the expression "asin" highlighted in the math editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Formula syntax

testcase.classname: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Maple-graded questions with Formula syntax

testsuite.system-out: Scenario: Default highlight rule for Mathematical Formula questions ?[90m# question/MathQuestionSyntaxChecker.feature:11?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI choose "?[0m?[32m?[1mMathematical Formula?[0m?[32m" link from the dialog and complete the correct answer?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.chooseTypeAndCompleteCorrectAnswer(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click OK?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.clickResponseDialogOkButton()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI see the "?[0m?[32m?[1mMathematical Formula?[0m?[32m" Question Widget in the question text section?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.assertQuestionWidgetIsInserted(String)?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI click the Preview button?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.clickPreviewButton()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI assert that the ?[0m?[32m?[1mMathematical Formula?[0m?[32m question is rendered properly on the Question Preview page?[0m ?[90m# QuestionPreviewSteps.assertQuestionRenderedCorrectly(String)?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI change the Mathematical Formula entry mode to Equation Editor?[0m ?[90m# MathmeticalFormulaElementSteps.changeFormulaEntryModeToEqe()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI see the math editor?[0m ?[90m# MathEditorComponentSteps.assertMathEditorVisible()?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI enter "?[0m?[32m?[1msinh?[0m?[32m" in the math editor?[0m ?[90m# MathEditorComponentSteps.typeText(String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI see the expression "?[0m?[32m?[1msinh?[0m?[32m" highlighted in the math editor?[0m ?[90m# MathEditorComponentSteps.assertTextHighlighted(String)?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI remove all text in the math editor?[0m ?[90m# MathEditorComponentSteps.removeText()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI enter "?[0m?[32m?[1masin?[0m?[32m" in the math editor?[0m ?[90m# MathEditorComponentSteps.typeText(String)?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI do not see the expression "?[0m?[32m?[1masin?[0m?[32m" highlighted in the math editor?[0m ?[90m# MathEditorComponentSteps.assertTextNotHighlighted(String)?[0m
